chatHistory.content:
Hi Alex,

I came across your profile and was particularly impressed by your work as a Software Engineer. As a fellow Computer Science student at UTS with a passion for AI, I believe we have a lot in common.

I've recently been working on a project called LinkPilot, an AI assistant for LinkedIn lead generation built with Next.js, MongoDB, Puppeteer, and the OpenAI API. I'd be thrilled to hear about any projects you're currently working on and discuss potential collaborations in AI + backend development.

Looking forward to connecting with you!

Best regards,

I'm really excited to connect with you! As a fellow Computer Science student at UTS with a shared passion for AI, I'd love to learn more about your recent projects and ideas.
